channel.title: Programming on Maxwell Jensen's Website

item.title: Thoughts on Programming Languages
item.description: There are a lot of programming languages, but often they are talked of in terms of what realistic applications they have in the job market. Seldom is there prose about their quality as such; independent of their popularity and application. Here’s some of my thoughts. Quality versus utility As most software engineers know, there is not really any correlation between the quality of a language and its popularity. There is however a correlation between popularity and utility.
